channel.title: Store prices!
channel.description:
how do i change the prices of items in my stores??!?!?!?
edit: i need help changin equipment stats
thanks

item.title: Store prices!
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:3, topic:367638”][quote author=Dastan_ link=topic=463791.msg3392546#msg3392546 date=1289076229]
Everything is done in ( ( item.java ) )

Look at this item

item = 4151	Abyssal_whip	A_weapon_from_the_abyss.	3000000.0013642381		3000000.0013642381		3000000.0013642381	0	82	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	82	0

First set of numbers is how much you get if you “Low Alchemy” the item.

Second set of numbers is “Shop Price”.

Third set of numbers is how much you get if you “High Alchemy” the item.

The rest are its stats from top to bottom.
[/quote]
i think you mean item.cfg?[/quote]

Yes , I’m sorry.

Sloppy mistake.

Read full topic
